message: Your turn Alice.  I'm feeling generous, but let's not drag this out.
I can do better than your generous offer, let's try 58-42
Okay, Alice, time is money.  Literally. Let's wrap this up.

Alice, this is getting ridiculous.  A 50/50 split is the only fair deal at this point. Take it or leave it.
